text: Va ʙa pindori xes guftand: «[Istifoda az] In cahorpojon va kistzor[-hoe, ki vaqfi ʙutho suda] mamnu' ast va hec kas az on namexurad, magar on [guruh az xodimoni ʙutho] ki mo mexohem va cahorpojone hastand, ki [savor sudan ʙar] pustason harom sudaast».Va domhoe [dostand], ki [hangomi zaʙh] nomi Alloh taoloro ʙar onho nameʙurdand, [inho hama ʙovarhoe ʙud, ki] ʙa duruƣ ʙa Alloh taolo nisʙat medodand [va Alloh taolo] ʙa xotiri on ci ʙa duruƣ meʙoftand, cazojasonro xohad dod
